thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Levallois Perret - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Levallois-Perret, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect
thread.title_full: Perfect - Review of Mercure Paris Levallois Perret, Levallois-Perret, France - TripAdvisor

author: MissDee89
title: Perfect
text: Stayed with my sister for a weekend in Paris. I can't fault this hotel. It's beautiful, clean and the staff are so lovely and helpful. The breakfast is not huge but you get everything you want. All the pastries are delicious. The metro is less than 5mins walk and in 15-20mins you will be in central Paris. Honestly can not find anything negative to say about my stay at this hotel. Would definitely book again.
